messages.sender: georgia chestnuts rust-ing on an open fire
messages.message: Wondering if it's a user error or if there's a bug preventing it from loading

Hey! To create a flow you have to go to the flow app and go to File > Create new flow. Creating .txt files through "New file" is okay because there's no metadata associated with them, but ibflow files store a bunch of information, so need to be created through the app

If you open this flow for example in preview mode, not in the flow app, you can see that it's actually a big json object: https://dogfood.instabase.com/anantb/workspace/fs/Instabase%20Drive/flow-examples/workspace-jessica/flows/lukes.ibflow
As far as usability and safety... we should think about if that "New file" functionality should actually have a way to create different file types, not just empty files

+1 â€” I believe @cross talk - a podcast about crosswords - listen on apple podcasts or spotify and @Ted are thinking about New File functionality, especially as it relates to Recipe Book / Widget builder inside of the filesystem
